articles.title: Chinese New Year tourism hopes fizzle for Asian destinations, as China's travellers stay home - CNA
articles.description: BANGKOK: A hoped-for boom in Chinese tourism in Asia over next week’s Chinese New Year holidays looks set to be more of a blip as most travellers opt to stay inside China if they go anywhere. From the beaches
articles.content: Just days before Sunday's start of the Chinese New Year, iconic tourist spots in the former Portuguese colony, like historic Senado Square and the Ruins of St. Pauls, were packed. Gambling floors at … [+1698 chars]
